quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Negligence isn’t just words, it’s a crime when it puts someone’s life at risk.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I understand, and I’ve made it clear it could have serious consequences if ignored.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Could? It already has. I’ve already been suicidal over this.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and I’m so sorry you’ve been through that.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Sorry doesn’t fix it. Action does, and still no action.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I hear you, Ben, and I’ll keep pressing that point.

contradictions.issue: Victim highlights negligence as crime and discloses suicidality; advocate offers sympathy but no safeguarding action

timeline_hooks.link: Potential criminal negligence safeguarding breach May 2025
